definition: radically distinctive and without equal, without any others being included or involved
details:
adjective
- radically distinctive and without equal
= synonyms: unique
- exclusive of anyone or anything else
= synonyms: only
- isolated from others
- lacking companions or companionship
= synonyms: solitary, lone, lonely
adverb
- without any others being included or involved
= synonyms: entirely
- without anybody else or anything else
= example: without anybody else or anything else
= synonyms: solo
